summary: Provides a collection of helper utilities for the internal Ansible test commandâ€‘line tools, including a structured representation of collection metadata, path resolution for Ansible binaries and Python interpreter, environment setup, inventory parsing, and a thin wrapper to invoke playbooks.
business_intent: Enable the Ansible test framework to reliably locate required executables, configure plugin and environment paths, retrieve collection information, and execute playbooks as part of automated testing and validation workflows.
